name: denormalized_table_specs_for_level_1_c2m2
title: A customized C2M2 Level 1 model augmented with Chaise display directives and extra (ETL) denormalized content

resources.name: file
resources.title: File
resources.description: A Level 1 digital asset

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the top-level C2M2 metadataset containing this file

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this file, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the primary project within which this file was created

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the primary project within which this file was created

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC (using, e.g., our minid server) and attached to this file

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this file's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: size_in_bytes
fields.description: The size of this file in bytes

fields.name: uncompressed_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The total decompressed size in bytes of the contents of this file

fields.name: sha256
fields.description: The output of the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function after being run on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: md5
fields.description: The output of the MD5 message-digest algorithm after being run as a cryptographic hash function on this file: one or both of sha256 and md5 is required; sha256 is preferred

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information.

fields.name: file_format
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the digital format of this file (e.g. TSV or FASTQ)

fields.name: data_type
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the type of information stored in this file (e.g. RNA sequence reads)

fields.name: assay_type
fields.description: An OBI CV term ID describing the type of experiment that generated the results summarized by this file

fields.name: mime_type
fields.description: A MIME type describing this file

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the file ID.

S_project.comment: The project attributed as the source of the file.

S_super_projects.comment: The project (or any super-projects) attributed as source of the file.

S_root_project.comment: The Common Fund Program attributed as source of the file.

S_file_format.comment: The content format of the file.

S_data_type.comment: The type of data represented by the file.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the file was created.

S_described_biosamples.comment: Biosamples described or characterized by the file.

S_anatomy.comment: Anatomy for biosamples described by file.

S_assay_type.comment: Assay type for biosamples described by file.

S_described_subjects.comment: Subjects described or characterized by the file.

S_part_of_collections.comment: Collections with the file record as a directly or indirectly constituent member.

S_taxonomy.comment: The taxonomy concept(s) characterizing subjects described directly or indirectly by the file.

and.comment: The specificity of the subject description, e.g. organism versus cell-line, of subjects described directly or indirectly by the file.
The taxonomical role(s) characterizing subjects described directly or indirectly by the file.
The time when a biosample described by this file was created.

resources.name: biosample
resources.title: Biosample
resources.description: A Level 1 tissue sample or other physical specimen

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the top-level C2M2 metadataset containing this biosample

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this biosample, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the primary project within which this biosample was created

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the primary project within which this biosample was created

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this biosample

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this biosample's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: anatomy
fields.description: An UBERON CV term ID used to locate the origin of this biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the biosample ID.

S_assay_type.comment: The assay type characterizing the biosample.

S_anatomy.comment: The anatomy from which the biosample is derived.

S_taxonomy.comment: The taxonomy concept(s) characterizing the subject of the biosampling.

S_project.comment: The project attributed as the source of the biosample.

S_root_project.comment: The Common Fund Program attributed as source of the biosample.

S_super_projects.comment: The project (or any super-projects) attributed as source of the biosample.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the biosample was created.

S_subjects.comment: The subject(s) from which the biosample is derived.

S_described_by_file.comment: Files whose content describes the biosample.

S_part_of_collections.comment: Collections with the biosample recor as a directly or indirectly constituent member.

resources.name: subject
resources.title: Subject
resources.description: A biological entity from which a Level 1 biosample can be generated

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the top-level C2M2 metadataset containing this subject

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this subject, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the primary project within which this subject was observed

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the primary project within which this subject was observed

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this subject

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this subject record's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: granularity
fields.description: A CFDE CV term categorizing this subject by multiplicity

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the subject ID.

S_project.comment: The project attributed as the source of the subject.

S_root_project.comment: The Common Fund Program attributed as source of the subject.

S_granularity.comment: The specificity of the subject description, e.g. organism versus cell-line.

S_role.comment: The taxonomic role concept(s) characterizing the subject.

S_taxonomy.comment: The taxonomy concept(s) characterizing the subject.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the subject record created.

S_files.comment: Files whose content describes the subject.

S_part_of_collections.comment: Collections with the subject record as a directly or indirectly constituent member.

and.comment: The project (or any super-projects) attributed as source of the subject.

resources.name: primary_dcc_contact
resources.title: Primary DCC Contact
resources.description: One primary contact person for the Common Fund data coordinating center (DCC) that produced the top-level C2M2 metadataset identified by the given project foreign key

fields.name: contact_email
fields.description: Email address of this DCC contact

fields.name: contact_name
fields.description: Name of this DCC contact

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the project record representing the top-level C2M2 metadataset produced by this contact's DCC

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the project record representing the top-level C2M2 metadataset produced by this contact's DCC

fields.name: dcc_abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this contact's DCC

fields.name: dcc_name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this contact's DCC

fields.name: dcc_description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this contact's DCC

fields.name: dcc_url
fields.description: URL of the front page of the website for this contact's DCC

resources.name: project
resources.title: Project
resources.description: A node in the Level 1 project hierarchy subdividing this id_namespace

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the top-level C2M2 metadataset containing this project

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this project, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this project

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this project's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this project

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this project

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this project

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifier for the project ID.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the project was created.

and.comment: Direct or indirect super-projects of the project.
Direct or indirect sub-projects of the project.
The granularity of a subject attributed to the project.
The taxonomic role of a subject attributed to the project.
The taxonomy of a subject attributed to the project.
The anatomy of a biosample attributed to the project.
The assay type of a biosample attributed to the project.
The content format of a file attributed to the project.
The type of data represented by a file attributed to the project.

resources.name: project_in_project
resources.title: project_in_project
resources.description: Association between a child project and its parent

fields.name: parent_project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the parent in this parent-child project pair

fields.name: parent_project_local_id
fields.description: The ID of the containing (parent) project

fields.name: child_project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the child in this parent-child project pair

fields.name: child_project_local_id
fields.description: The ID of the contained (child) project

resources.name: collection
resources.title: Collection
resources.description: A grouping of Level 1 files, biosamples and/or subjects

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.title: ID Namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the top-level C2M2 metadataset containing this collection

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An ID representing this collection, unique within this id_namespace

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.title: Persistent ID
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not nec. retrievable) URI generated by a DCC and attached to this collection

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this collection's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this collection

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this collection

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this collection

S_id_namespace.comment: The namespace qualifying the collection ID.

S_project.comment: The project which defined the collection.

S_root_project.comment: The Common Fund Program which defined the collection.

S_super_projects.comment: A project (or super-project) which defined the collection.

S_file_format.comment: The content format of a constituent file.

S_data_type.comment: The type of data represented by a constituent file.

S_assay_type.comment: The assay type of a directly or indirectly constituent biosample.

S_anatomy.comment: The anatomical source of a directly or indirectly constituent biosample.

S_creation_time.comment: The time when the collection was created.

and.comment: The taxonomy of a directly or indirectly constituent subject.
The specificity of description for a directly or indirectly consituent subject.
The taxonomic role for a directly or indirectly constituent subject.
The time when a constituent file was created.
The time when a constituent biosample was created.
Collections directly or indirectly containing the collection.
Constituent subjects of the collection.
Constituent biosamples of the collection.
Constituent files of the collection.

resources.name: subject_role_taxonomy
resources.title: Subject Role Taxonomy
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a subject, (2) a subject_role (a named organism-level constituent component of a subject, like 'host', 'pathogen', 'endosymbiont', 'taxon detected inside a microbiome subject', etc.) and (3) a taxonomic label (which is hereby assigned to this particular subject_role within this particular subject)

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: role_id
fields.description: The ID of the role assigned to this organism-level constituent component of this subject

fields.name: taxonomy_id
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this taxon

resources.name: assay_type
resources.title: Assay Type
resources.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used in this dataset to describe types of experiment that generate results stored in Level 1 files

fields.name: id
fields.description: An OBI CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this OBI term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate OBI terms) equivalent to this OBI term

resources.name: ncbi_taxonomy
resources.title: NCBI Taxonomy
resources.description: List of NCBI Taxonomy Database IDs identifying taxa used to describe Level 1 subjects in this dataset

fields.name: id
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying a particular taxon

fields.name: clade
fields.description: The phylogenetic level (e.g. species, genus) assigned to this taxon (use 'no rank' if not defined)

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this taxon

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this taxon

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate NCBI Taxonomy IDs) equivalent to this taxon

resources.name: anatomy
resources.title: Anatomy
resources.description: List of Uber-anatomy ontology (Uberon) CV terms used in this dataset to locate the origin of a Level 1 biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

fields.name: id
fields.description: An Uberon CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Uberon term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this Uberon term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate Uberon terms) equivalent to this Uberon term

resources.name: file_format
resources.title: File Format
resources.description: List of EDAM CV 'format:' terms used to describe formats of Level 1 files in this dataset

fields.name: id
fields.description: An EDAM CV format term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this EDAM format term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM format term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate EDAM format terms) equivalent to this EDAM format term

resources.name: data_type
resources.title: Data Type
resources.description: List of EDAM CV 'data:' terms used to describe data in Level 1 files in this dataset

fields.name: id
fields.description: An EDAM CV data term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this EDAM data term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM data term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Pipe-separated list of synonyms (alternate EDAM data terms) equivalent to this EDAM data term

resources.name: subject_role
resources.title: Subject Role
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The ontological role of an organism-level constituent component of a Level 1 subject, e.g.: unitary organism (e.g. 'this subject represents a single orchid and that's it'), host, pathogen, symbiont, taxon detected in microbiome, host associated with microbiome, taxon in lineage of cell line, etc.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_role

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_role

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_role

resources.name: subject_granularity
resources.title: Subject Granularity
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: The category of a Level 1 subject in terms of multiplicity, e.g.: single organism; enumerated group of organisms and their relationships to one another (e.g. host X plus endosymbiont Y); host-associated microbiome; environmental microbiome; cell line

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this subject_granularity

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this subject_granularity

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this subject_granularity

resources.name: id_namespace
resources.title: ID Namespace
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: Dictionary of CFDE-generated identifier namespaces corresponding to top-level C2M2 metadatasets

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this identifier namespace

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace
